questions.question: Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?

answers.answer: If i know that i will die within 10 years,may be i will try to be happy and spend most of my time in my familly and friends.and if i have some mony i will try to travailing the world but i know it will be very hard to say to my familly that i will die within 10 years.so i will try to remain happy and joyfull.
